implementation_summary: Added 'rename' CLI command that exposes the existing Todo.rename() method

cli.py.todoapp_rename_method: Added rename() method to TodoApp class
cli.py.build_parser: Added 'rename' subparser with id and text arguments

acceptance_criteria.rename_success: Running 'todo rename 1 new text' successfully renames todo #1
acceptance_criteria.nonexistent_id_error: Running 'todo rename 99 text' returns error code 1 with 'not found' message
acceptance_criteria.empty_text_error: Running 'todo rename 1 ""' returns error code 1 with 'cannot be empty' message

risks: None - minimal change following existing patterns
